trans-unit.source: Displays ADO.NET data in a scrollable grid.
trans-unit.target: 在可滚动的网格中显示 ADO.NET 数据。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control replaces and adds functionality to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control; however, the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件取代了 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 控件并添加了功能；但是，可以选择保留 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 控件以实现向后兼容并供将来使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> displays Web-like links to child tables.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>为子表中显示的类似 Web 链接。

trans-unit.source: You can click on a link to navigate to the child table.
trans-unit.target: 你可以单击链接以导航到子表。

trans-unit.source: When a child table is displayed, a back button appears in the caption that can be clicked to navigate back to the parent table.
trans-unit.target: 当显示子表时，可通过单击导航回父表的标题中显示后退按钮。

trans-unit.source: The data from the parent rows is displayed below the caption and above the column headers.
trans-unit.target: 中的父行的数据显示在标题下方并列标头的上面。

trans-unit.source: You can hide the parent row information by clicking the button to the right of the back button.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过单击后退按钮右边的按钮隐藏父行信息。

trans-unit.source: To display a table in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> at run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties to a valid data source.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示的表中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>在运行时，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>方法以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>到有效的数据源的属性。

trans-unit.source: The following data sources are valid:
trans-unit.target: 以下数据源是有效的：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataTable>
trans-unit.target: 一个 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataView>
trans-unit.target: 一个 <xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataSet>
trans-unit.target: 一个 <xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>
trans-unit.target: 一个 <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>

trans-unit.source: A single dimension array
trans-unit.target: 一维数组

trans-unit.source: Any component that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface
trans-unit.target: 实现的任何组件<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>接口

trans-unit.source: Any component that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface
trans-unit.target: 实现的任何组件<xref:System.Collections.IList>接口

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> class, see [DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Data.DataSet>类，请参阅[数据集、 数据表和数据视图](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a <xref:System.Data.DataView> as the data source and setting the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建一个网格，使用户能够编辑数据，但不能通过添加新行<xref:System.Data.DataView>作为数据源并选择设置<xref:System.Data.DataView.AllowNew%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: Data sources are further managed by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> objects.
trans-unit.target: 由进一步管理数据源<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>对象。

trans-unit.source: For each table in a data source, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> can be returned from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>.
trans-unit.target: 为每个表中数据源，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>可以从窗体的返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can determine the number of rows contained by a data source by returning the associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase> object's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以确定包含的数据源通过返回关联的行数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase>对象的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingManagerBase.Count%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: To validate data, use the underlying objects that represent data and their events.
trans-unit.target: 若要验证数据，使用表示的数据和其事件的基础对象。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the data comes from a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, use the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging> and <xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging> events.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果数据来自<xref:System.Data.DataTable>中<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，使用<xref:System.Data.DataTable.ColumnChanging>和<xref:System.Data.DataTable.RowChanging>事件。

trans-unit.source: Because the number of columns can be customized (by adding or deleting members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) and the rows can be sorted by column, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A> property values cannot be guaranteed to correspond to <xref:System.Data.DataRow> and <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> indexes in a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 因为可以自定义的列数 (通过添加或删除的成员<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>) 并可以按列排序行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.RowNumber%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell.ColumnNumber%2A>属性值不能保证对应于<xref:System.Data.DataRow>和<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>索引中<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: Therefore you should avoid using those properties in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating> event to validate data.
trans-unit.target: 因此应避免使用这些属性中的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Validating>事件，以便验证数据。

trans-unit.source: To determine which cell is selected, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定选择哪个单元格，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Change the value of any cell by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Item%2A> property, which can take either the row and column indexes of the cell, or a single <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>.
trans-unit.target: 使用更改任何单元格的值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Item%2A>属性，这可能会花费的单元格的行和列索引，或者单个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell>。

trans-unit.source: Monitor the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCellChanged> event to detect when the user selects another cell.
trans-unit.target: 监视器<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCellChanged>事件来检测当用户选择另一个单元格。

trans-unit.source: To determine which part of the control the user clicked, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定用户单击的控件的哪个部分，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>中的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo> object, which contains the row and column of a clicked area.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTestInfo>对象，它包含的行和列被单击区域。

trans-unit.source: To manage the appearance of the control at run time, several properties for setting the color and caption attributes are available, including the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionForeColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionBackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionFont%2A>, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 若要管理在运行时控件的外观，了几个属性用于设置颜色和标题属性可用，包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionForeColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionBackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionFont%2A>，依次类推。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the displayed grid (or grids) can be further modified by creating <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects and adding them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 显示网格 （或网格） 的外观可以进行进一步的修改通过创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>对象并将它们添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>，通过访问的哪一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> containing three <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects, you can add three <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the collection, one for each table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>设置为<xref:System.Data.DataSet>包含三个<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象，你可以添加三个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>到集合的对象，每个表的一个对象。

trans-unit.source: To synchronize each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> object with a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 以同步每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>对象<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>到<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about binding to an array of objects, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关绑定到一个数组对象的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: To create a customized view of a table, create an instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn> class and add the object to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建表的自定义的视图，创建的实例<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridBoolColumn>类并向其中添加对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>通过访问<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Both classes inherit from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 这两个类均从 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> 继承。

trans-unit.source: For each column style, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a column that you want to show in the grid.
trans-unit.target: 对于每个列样式，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>到<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>你想要在网格中显示的列。

trans-unit.source: To hide a column, set its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to something other than a valid <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏某一列，设置其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>为有效以外<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To format the text of a column, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn> to one of the values found in [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要设置格式的列的文本，将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn.Format%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTextBoxColumn>中找到的值之一[格式化类型](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: To bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要将绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>对象类型必须为对象的强类型化数组包含公共属性。

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> that displays the array, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `typename[]` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>显示数组时，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性`typename[]`其中`typename`替换为对象类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: Also note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: 另请注意，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>属性是区分大小写; 必须完全匹配的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property for an example.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>有关示例的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以将绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>到<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: 一项功能<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是，它可以包含多个类型的对象但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>与第一项相同的类型的列表中的所有项时只能绑定到此类列表。

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着所有对象必须都是相同的类型，或者它们必须从列表中的第一个项相同的类继承。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果在列表中的第一项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，第二个项可能是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(其继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>)。

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，如果第一项是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，第二个对象不能为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>。

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>时将其绑定必须具有在其中的项。

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: 一个空<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>将导致空网格。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the objects in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外中的对象<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>必须包含公共属性。

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: 绑定到时<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>到"ArrayList"（类型名称）。

trans-unit.source: For each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>, you can set color and caption attributes that override the settings for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>，您可以设置颜色和标题特性来重写的设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件。

trans-unit.source: However, if those properties are not set, the settings for the control are used by default.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果未设置这些属性，默认使用控件的设置。

trans-unit.source: The following properties can be overridden by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> properties:
trans-unit.target: 以下属性可以通过重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>属性：

trans-unit.source: To customize the appearance of individual columns, add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>, which is accessed through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义各列的外观，将添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>，通过访问的哪一<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A>每个属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>。

trans-unit.source: To synchronize each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> with a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 以同步每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>与<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>中<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>到<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>。

trans-unit.source: When constructing a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>, you can also set a formatting string that specifies how the column displays data.
trans-unit.target: 在构造时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>，您还可以设置指定列如何显示数据的格式化字符串。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify that the column use a short-date format to display dates contained in the table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可以指定此列使用短日期格式显示表中包含的日期。

trans-unit.source: Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 始终创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象，并将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>之前添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: 当你将添加一个空<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>使用一个有效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>到集合中，值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>自动为你生成的对象。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试添加新因此，将引发异常<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象具有重复<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>值复制到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control; however, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use, if you choose.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> 控件取代了 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> 控件并添加了功能；但是，可以选择保留 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> 控件以实现向后兼容并供将来使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Differences Between the Windows Forms DataGridView and DataGrid Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件与 DataGrid 控件之间的区别](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a Windows form, a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> containing two <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects, and a <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> that relates the two tables.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例创建 Windows 窗体，<xref:System.Data.DataSet>包含两个<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象，和一个<xref:System.Data.DataRelation>与相关的两个表。

trans-unit.source: To display the data, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control is then bound to the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 显示数据，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>然后将控件绑定到<xref:System.Data.DataSet>通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: A button on the form changes the appearance of the grid by creating two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of each object to a <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of one of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects.
trans-unit.target: 窗体上的按钮的网格外观更改通过创建两个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>对象和设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>到每个对象的<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>之一的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象。

trans-unit.source: The example also contains code in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp> event that uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A> method to print the column, row, and part of the grid that has been clicked.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还包含中的代码<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp>使用的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.HitTest%2A>方法打印列、 行和已单击网格的一部分。

trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.target: 若要填充新创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控制、 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>属性设置为有效的源，如<xref:System.Data.DataView>， <xref:System.Data.DataSet>，或<xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> and uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether navigation is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指示是否允许导航的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if navigation is allowed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许导航，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, links to child tables are not shown.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`false`，将不会显示指向子表链接。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例切换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>属性之间`true`和`false`。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation" /> 属性更改后发生。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A> property is set to `false`, then no links to child tables are shown.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>属性设置为`false`，则将显示指向子表没有链接。

trans-unit.source: The following code example resets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A> property and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigationChanged> event.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the grid can be resorted by clicking on a column header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否可以通过单击列标题对网格进行重新排序。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if columns can be sorted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果可以对列进行排序，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is overridden by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property if there is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> currently in effect for the control.
trans-unit.target: 通过重写此属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.AllowSorting%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性，如果没有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>当前中控件的效果。

trans-unit.source: If sorting is allowed, clicking on a column header will sort the table data by that column.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许排序，则单击列标题将进行排序依据的列的表数据。

trans-unit.source: You can also sort using an expression for a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以使用的表达式进行排序<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A> for details on creating a sort expression.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.Expression%2A>有关创建的排序表达式的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> is bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataView>, you can set a custom sort for the table using the <xref:System.Data.DataView> class's <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>绑定到<xref:System.Data.DataView>，你可以设置自定义排序表使用<xref:System.Data.DataView>类的<xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> is bound to a <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>, each table in the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> can have a custom sort by setting the <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager.DataViewSettings%2A> class's <xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting.Sort%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 同样，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>绑定到<xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>，每个表中的<xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>可以通过设置具有自定义排序<xref:System.Data.DataViewManager.DataViewSettings%2A>类的<xref:System.Data.DataViewSetting.Sort%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example toggles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowSorting%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例切换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowSorting%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of odd-numbered rows of the grid.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置网格中奇数行的背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the alternating background color.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，它代表交替的背景色。

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for windows (<see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window" />).
trans-unit.target: 默认为窗口 (<see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window" />) 的系统颜色。

trans-unit.source: By default, both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A> properties are set to the same color.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，同时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>属性设置为相同的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> property affects only even-numbered rows, while setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A> affects only odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>属性会影响仅偶数行，而设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>影响仅奇数行。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>到<xref:System.Drawing.Color>值。

trans-unit.target: 在单击子表上的 <see langword="Back" /> 按钮时发生。

trans-unit.source: The `Back` button becomes visible when a child table is displayed.
trans-unit.target: `Back`显示子表时，按钮将变为可见。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the button will cause the grid to display the parent table.
trans-unit.target: 单击按钮将导致网格显示父表。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color of even-numbered rows of the grid.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置网格中偶数行的背景色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the color of rows in the grid.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，它代表网格中行的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The default is the system color for windows (<see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window" />).
trans-unit.target: 默认为窗口 (<see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.Window" />) 的系统颜色。

trans-unit.source: Whereas the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> property determines the color of rows in the grid, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A> determines the color of the nonrow area, which is only visible when the grid is scrolled to the bottom, or if only a few rows are contained in the grid.
trans-unit.target: 而<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>属性确定在网格中，行的颜色<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A>确定中行区域，该网格滚动到底部，或只在网格中包含少量的行时才可见区域的颜色。

trans-unit.source: By default, both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A> properties are set to the same color.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，同时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>属性设置为相同的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> property affects only even-numbered rows, while setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A> affects only odd-numbered rows.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>属性会影响仅偶数行，而设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AlternatingBackColor%2A>影响仅奇数行。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A> properties to different values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置同时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackColor%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A>为不同的值的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the non-row area of the grid.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置网格中非行区域的颜色。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" /> that represents the color of the grid's background.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Color" />，它代表网格的背景的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The default is the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace" /> color.
trans-unit.target: 默认是 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.AppWorkspace" /> 颜色。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A> determines the color of the nonrow area of the grid, which is only visible when no table is displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>, or if the grid is scrolled to the bottom, or if only a few rows are contained in the grid.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BackgroundColor%2A>确定网格中没有表显示由时才可见中非行区域的颜色<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>，或如果网格滚动到底部，或如果只有少量的行包含在网格中。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ActiveCaptionText" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Drawing.SystemColors.ActiveCaptionText" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the grid's window caption.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置网格窗口标题的文本。

trans-unit.source: A string to be displayed as the window caption of the grid.
trans-unit.target: 要作为网格的窗口标题显示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the grid's caption is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示该网格的标题是否可见。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the caption is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该标题可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionVisible%2A> is `false`, the **Back** button, **ParentRow** button, and caption will not be seen.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionVisible%2A>是`false`、**回**按钮， **ParentRow**按钮，然后标题将不会被发现。

trans-unit.source: Because navigation is limited, links to child tables will also not be visible and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A> will be set to `None`.
trans-unit.target: 因为导航受到限制，指向子表还将看不和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.AllowNavigation%2A>将设置为`None`。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例切换<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionVisible%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CaptionVisible" /> 属性更改后发生。

trans-unit.target: 要折叠的行数。

trans-unit.source: If set to -1, all rows are collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置为 -1，则折叠所有行。

trans-unit.source: Collapses child relations, if any exist for all rows, or for a specified row.
trans-unit.target: 折叠对于所有行存在的子关系或折叠指定行的子关系。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.IsExpanded%2A> method to determine if a row is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.IsExpanded%2A>方法来确定某行是否展开。

trans-unit.target: 如果列标题可见，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Informs the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control that the user has begun editing a column.
trans-unit.target: 通知 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 控件用户已开始编辑列。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that defines the location of the edited column.
trans-unit.target: 定义所编辑列位置的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: Informs the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control when the user begins to edit the column at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 当用户开始在指定位置编辑列时通知 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: When called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A> method enables the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control to show a pencil in the row header.
trans-unit.target: 调用时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A>方法可以使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件以显示行标题中的铅笔。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> used to edit the column.
trans-unit.target: 用于编辑列的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: Informs the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control when the user begins to edit a column using the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 当用户开始使用指定控件编辑列时通知 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 控件。

trans-unit.source: When called, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A> method enables the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control to show a pencil in the row header.
trans-unit.target: 调用时，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataGridColumnStyleEditingNotificationService.ColumnStartedEditing%2A>方法可以使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件以显示行标题中的铅笔。

trans-unit.target: 此控件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" />。

trans-unit.source: Derived classes should not call the base class's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类不应调用基类的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Only the following properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> should be set:
trans-unit.target: 仅有以下属性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>应设置：

trans-unit.source: All other properties are handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> itself.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他属性将由<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>本身。

trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />，它将添加到控件中。

trans-unit.target: 用于创建网格列样式的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> with the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 创建一个新的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" /> to use for creating the grid column style.
trans-unit.target: 用于创建网格列样式的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to set the column style as the default; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 若要将该列样式设置为默认样式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" /> 创建一个 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets which cell has the focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置具有焦点的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Not available at design time.
trans-unit.target: 设计时不可用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" /> with the focus.
trans-unit.target: 具有焦点的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridCell" />。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property will cause the grid to scroll and show the cell if it is not already visible.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>属性将导致要滚动，并显示是否尚不可见的单元格的网格。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set and get the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置和获取对当前单元格。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell" /> 属性更改后发生。

trans-unit.source: To determine the current cell, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定当前的单元格，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets index of the row that currently has focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当前具有焦点的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the current row.
trans-unit.target: 当前行的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A> property to a value other than its current value scrolls the control so that the specified row is in view.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A>到其当前值以外的值的属性滚动控件，以使指定的行显示在视图。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A> property enables you to iterate through a parent table's rows even if you are viewing the child table rows.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A>属性使您能够循环访问父表的行，即使你正在查看子表行。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are viewing a child table, incrementing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A> will cause the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> to display the next set of records in the child table that are linked to the parent table.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您查看子表，递增<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A>将导致<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>以显示子表链接到父表中的下一个记录集。

trans-unit.source: If the user is viewing a parent table, or a table with no child relations, then the property returns the zero-based index of the current row.
trans-unit.target: 如果用户正在查看父表或表没有子关系，该属性将返回当前行的从零开始的索引。

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CurrentRowIndex%2A>。

trans-unit.source: There is no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />.
trans-unit.target: 没有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.CurrencyManager" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此成员对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: The type of cursor to display as the mouse pointer moves over the object.
trans-unit.target: 在鼠标指针移到对象上时要显示的光标类型。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CursorChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Cursor%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.CursorChanged>事件来检测更改。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the specific list in a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource" /> for which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control displays a grid.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource" /> 中的特定列表，<see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 控件为该数据源显示网格。

trans-unit.source: A list in a <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource" /> 中的一个列表。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串("")。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> contains multiple sources of data, you should set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> to one of the sources.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>包含多个源的数据，应设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>到其中一个源。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> that contains three tables named `Customers`, `Orders`, and `OrderDetails`, you must specify one of the tables to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>是<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>，其中包含三个表名为`Customers`， `Orders`，和`OrderDetails`，必须指定一个要绑定到的表。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> contains only one <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, you should set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of that <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>只包含一个<xref:System.Data.DataTable>，应设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>到<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is set to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> that contains <xref:System.Data.DataRelation> objects, parent tables will appear with a plus sign (+) in each row header.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>设置为<xref:System.Data.DataSet>包含<xref:System.Data.DataRelation>对象时，父表将显示与每个行标头中的加号 （+）。

trans-unit.source: Clicking the plus sign causes a node to appear that contains links to child tables.
trans-unit.target: 单击加号将导致出现包含指向子表链接一个节点。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> contains two <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objects named `Customers` and `Orders`, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> to the `Customers` table causes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> to display a parent table with a plus sign visible on each row header.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Data.DataSet>包含两个<xref:System.Data.DataTable>对象命名的`Customers`和`Orders`，则设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>到`Customers`表会使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>在每一行上显示父表，其中显示一个加号标头。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> is set to `Orders`, however, the row headers will be blank.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>设置为`Orders`，但是，行标题将为空。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is a <xref:System.Data.DataTable>, <xref:System.Data.DataView>, collection, or array, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> property throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>是<xref:System.Data.DataTable>， <xref:System.Data.DataView>，集合或数组，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>属性引发异常。

trans-unit.source: At run time, you must use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method to reset the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，必须使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>方法来重置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> property alone can be reset at any time to a valid table name.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>单独的属性可以随时为有效表名称重置。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the data source that the grid is displaying data for.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置网格所显示数据的数据源。

trans-unit.source: An object that functions as a data source.
trans-unit.target: 作为数据源的对象。

trans-unit.source: At run time, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A> method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 在运行时，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.SetDataBinding%2A>方法以设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following data sources are valid:
trans-unit.target: 以下数据源是有效的：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataTable>
trans-unit.target: 一个 <xref:System.Data.DataTable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataView>
trans-unit.target: 一个 <xref:System.Data.DataView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataSet>
trans-unit.target: 一个 <xref:System.Data.DataSet>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>
trans-unit.target: 一个 <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>

trans-unit.source: Any component that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> interface
trans-unit.target: 实现的任何组件<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>接口

trans-unit.source: Any component that implements the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface
trans-unit.target: 实现的任何组件<xref:System.Collections.IList>接口

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding> class overview for more information on data sources.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Binding>数据源的详细信息的类概述。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> reference contains more than one table, you must set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> property a string that specifies the table to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>引用包含多个表，则必须设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>的字符串，指定要绑定到的表的属性。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> is a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> or <xref:System.Data.DataViewManager> that contains three tables named `Customers`, `Orders`, and `OrderDetails`, you must specify the table to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>是<xref:System.Data.DataSet>或<xref:System.Data.DataViewManager>，其中包含三个表名为`Customers`， `Orders`，和`OrderDetails`，必须指定要绑定到的表。

trans-unit.source: Setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A> to an object that does not implement the <xref:System.Collections.IList> interface or an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource> will cause the grid to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>到未实现的对象<xref:System.Collections.IList>接口或<xref:System.ComponentModel.IListSource>将导致网格引发异常。

trans-unit.source: You can create a grid that enables users to edit data but prevents them from adding new rows by using a <xref:System.Data.DataView> as the data source and setting the <xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建一个网格，使用户能够编辑数据，但不能通过添加新行<xref:System.Data.DataView>作为数据源并选择设置<xref:System.Data.DataView.AddNew%2A>属性`false`。

trans-unit.source: To bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to a strongly typed array of objects, the object type must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要将绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>对象类型必须为对象的强类型化数组包含公共属性。

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> that displays the array, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `typename` where `typename` is replaced by the name of the object type.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>显示数组时，设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性`typename`其中`typename`替换为对象类型的名称。

trans-unit.source: Also note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property is case-sensitive; the type name must be matched exactly.
trans-unit.target: 另请注意，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>属性是区分大小写; 必须完全匹配的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> property for an example.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>有关示例的属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also bind the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以将绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>到<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>。

trans-unit.source: A feature of the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> is that it can contain objects of multiple types, but the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> can only bind to such a list when all items in the list are of the same type as the first item.
trans-unit.target: 一项功能<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>是，它可以包含多个类型的对象但<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>与第一项相同的类型的列表中的所有项时只能绑定到此类列表。

trans-unit.source: This means that all objects must either be of the same type, or they must inherit from the same class as the first item in the list.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着所有对象必须都是相同的类型，或者它们必须从列表中的第一个项相同的类继承。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the first item in a list is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, the second item could be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> (which inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>).
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果在列表中的第一项<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，第二个项可能是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>(其继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>)。

trans-unit.source: If, on the other hand, the first item is a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>, the second object cannot be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，如果第一项是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>，第二个对象不能为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>。

trans-unit.source: Further, the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must have items in it when it is bound.
trans-unit.target: 此外，<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>时将其绑定必须具有在其中的项。

trans-unit.source: An empty <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> will result in an empty grid.
trans-unit.target: 一个空<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>将导致空网格。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the objects in the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList> must contain public properties.
trans-unit.target: 此外中的对象<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>必须包含公共属性。

trans-unit.source: When binding to an <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to "ArrayList" (the type name).
trans-unit.target: 绑定到时<xref:System.Collections.ArrayList>，将其设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>到"ArrayList"（类型名称）。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>, and when needed, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>, to bind a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> to both a <xref:System.Data.DataView> and a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource%2A>，如果需要<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>，若要将绑定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>同时向<xref:System.Data.DataView>和<xref:System.Data.DataSet>。

trans-unit.source: The example also shows how to return data sources from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还演示如何返回数据源从<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource" /> property value has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSource" /> 属性值更改后发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSourceChanged> event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A> value changes, or when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid> changes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataSourceChanged>事件发生时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.DataMember%2A>值发生更改时，或者当<xref:System.Windows.Forms.BindingContext>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid>更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.target: 处置由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 占用的资源（内存除外）。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Dispose%2A> 后，应调用 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Dispose%2A> 方法使 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> 处于不可用状态。

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> so the memory it was occupying can be reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 在调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Dispose%2A>，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>以便可以通过垃圾回收回收其占用的内存。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Dispose%2A>方法来释放资源。

trans-unit.target: 初始化发生在运行时。

trans-unit.source: The Visual Studio design environment uses this method to end the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio 设计环境使用此方法来结束的窗体上使用或由另一个组件的组件初始化。

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.EndInit%2A>方法阻止控件完全初始化之前使用。

trans-unit.source: Displays child relations, if any exist, for all rows or a specific row.
trans-unit.target: 显示所有行或特定行的子关系（如果存在）。

trans-unit.source: Previews a keyboard message and returns a value indicating if the key was consumed.
trans-unit.target: 预览键盘消息，并返回指示该键是否已使用的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the key was consumed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果该键已使用，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by a child control when the child control receives a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: 当子控件接收键盘消息时，将由子控件调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: The child control calls this method before generating any keyboard events for the message.
trans-unit.target: 子控件生成消息的任何键盘事件前调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: If this method returns `true`, the child control considers the message consumed and does not generate any keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: 如果此方法返回`true`，子控件会考虑使用的消息并不会生成任何键盘事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the grid is in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个指示网格是否处于只读模式的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the grid is in read-only mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果网格处于只读模式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: In read-only mode, the grid can be scrolled, nodes can be expanded or collapsed, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 可以在只读模式下，滚动网格，可以展开或折叠节点，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: However, no additions, edits, or deletes can take place.
trans-unit.target: 但是，没有添加、 编辑或删除会发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> also has a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A> property that can be set to true to prevent data from being edited, on a column-by-column basis.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>还有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.ReadOnly%2A>可以设置为 true，以防止数据列由列基于正在编辑的属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ReadOnly%2A> can be set to true if you want to prohibit the user from editing the data directly in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ReadOnly%2A>可以设置为 true，如果你想要禁止用户编辑直接在数据<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want to let users to see all columns in a table, but allow them to edit specific fields only through <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls on a different form.
trans-unit.target: 例如，你可能想要允许用户查看所有列在表中，但允许它们进行编辑特定字段只能通过<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>其他窗体上的控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the site of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置控件的站点。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" /> associated with the Control, if any.
trans-unit.target: 与控件关联的 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISite" />（如果有）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to add the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> objects to a container; <see langword="false" /> to remove them.
trans-unit.target: 若要向容器中添加 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> 对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；若要移除，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Adds or removes the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> objects from the container that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: 从与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> 关联的容器中添加或移除 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> objects for the grid.
trans-unit.target: 获取网格的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" /> that represents the collection of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection" />，它代表 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle" /> 对象的集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> retrieved through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property to create customized views of each table displayed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>通过检索<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>属性来创建自定义的视图显示每个表的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件。

trans-unit.source: By default, the collection returned by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property does not contain any <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，通过返回的集合<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>属性不包含任何<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>对象。

trans-unit.source: To create a set of customized views:
trans-unit.target: 若要创建一组自定义视图：

trans-unit.source: Create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the grid table object to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>网格表对象与<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: Add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects, one for each grid column you want to show, to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象，为你想要显示，为每个网格列的一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> to the <xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A> of a <xref:System.Data.DataColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>到<xref:System.Data.DataColumn.ColumnName%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataColumn>。

trans-unit.source: Add the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> object to the collection returned by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>到返回的集合对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Always create <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects and add them to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> before adding <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> objects to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 始终创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象，并将其添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>之前添加<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>对象添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: When you add an empty <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> with a valid <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> value to the collection, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects are automatically generated for you.
trans-unit.target: 当你将添加一个空<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>使用一个有效<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>到集合中，值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>自动为你生成的对象。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, an exception will be thrown if you try to add new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> objects with duplicate <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> values to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试添加新因此，将引发异常<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>对象具有重复<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>值复制到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> for each <xref:System.Data.DataTable> found in a <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> to the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A> of the <xref:System.Data.DataTable>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例将创建一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>每个<xref:System.Data.DataTable>中找到<xref:System.Data.DataSet>，并将设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.MappingName%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>到<xref:System.Data.DataTable.TableName%2A>的<xref:System.Data.DataTable>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> is then added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>随后添加到<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TableStyles%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The example also prints the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A> of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A> property of each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例还输出<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle.MappingName%2A>每个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridColumnStylesCollection>返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle.GridColumnStyles%2A>每个属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridTableStyle>中<xref:System.Windows.Forms.GridTableStylesCollection>。

trans-unit.source: This member is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: 此成员对于此控件无意义。

trans-unit.source: The text associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: 与该控件关联的文本。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Text" /> property changes.
trans-unit.target: 当 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Text" /> 属性的值更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Text%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TextChanged> event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Text%2A>属性不为此控件有意义，但可以更改它的值，还可以处理<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.TextChanged>事件来检测更改。

trans-unit.source: The index of the row to deselect.
trans-unit.target: 要撤消选择的行的索引。

trans-unit.source: Unselects a specified row.
trans-unit.target: 取消指定行的选定。

trans-unit.source: Use this method with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.IsSelected%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Select%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ResetSelection%2A> methods to manipulate the selection state of a particular row.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法与<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.IsSelected%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.Select%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid.ResetSelection%2A>操作的特定行的选择状态的方法。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical scroll bar of the control.
trans-unit.target: 获取控件的垂直滚动条。

trans-unit.source: The vertical <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" /> of the grid.
trans-unit.target: 网格的垂直 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollBar" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of visible columns.
trans-unit.target: 获取可见列的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of columns visible in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 视区中可见列的数目。

trans-unit.source: The viewport is the rectangular area through which the grid is visible.
trans-unit.target: 视区是一个矩形区域，通过它可看见网格。

trans-unit.source: The size of the viewport depends on the size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control; if you allow users to resize the control, the viewport will also be affected.
trans-unit.target: 视区的大小取决于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 控件的大小；如果允许用户调整该控件的大小，视区也将受影响。

trans-unit.source: The number of visible columns can change depending on their width.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于它们的宽度，可以更改可见列的数目。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a default width for all columns is set, but the width of a new column is set twice as large, the number of visible columns can be reduced by at least one.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果设置的所有列的默认宽度，但新列的宽度设置两次尽可能大，可以通过至少一种减小可见列的数目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns the number of visible columns.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例返回可见列的数目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取可见行的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows visible in the viewport.
trans-unit.target: 视区中可见行的数目。

trans-unit.source: The viewport is the rectangular area through which the grid is visible.
trans-unit.target: 视区是一个矩形区域，通过它可看见网格。

trans-unit.source: The size of the viewport depends on the size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> control; if you allow users to resize the control, the viewport will also be affected.
trans-unit.target: 视区的大小取决于 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid" /> 控件的大小；如果允许用户调整该控件的大小，视区也将受影响。

trans-unit.source: The number of visible rows can be changed at run time if the user is allowed to resize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果允许用户调整其大小可以在运行时更改可见的行数<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example returns the number of rows visible in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例返回的行数中可见<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGrid?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件。
